recommended_degree: Teknik Arsitektur, Teknik Infrastruktur Sipil dan Perancangan Arsitektur, Teknik Konstruksi Gedung, Teknik Sipil, Teknik Sipil Bangunan Gedung (Sarjana)
job_description:
- Assist in pre-contract and post-contract QS activities.
- Support preparation of tender documents, BOQ, and basic cost estimates.
-  Help monitor project costs and update financial reports.
-  Assist in budget tracking and simple cost forecasting.
-  Support documentation of variation orders.
-  Assist in preparing draft final accounts.
-  Coordinate with project teams and contractors as needed.
